Name: Americas Best Value Inn Pottstown
Description: Complimentary breakfast & Wi-Fi at a low-key budget hotel with guest laundry, plus free parking.

Name: Valley Forge Casino Resort
Description: Casual casino hotel offering a spa, a seasonal outdoor pool & dining, plus 2 event venues.

Name: The Prussia Hotel, BW Signature Collection
Description: Laid-back budget hotel with a seasonal outdoor pool & a gym, plus free breakfast & parking.

Name: Mainstay Inn
Description: Casual redbrick hotel offering simple rooms, plus free continental breakfast, parking & Wi-Fi.

Name: French Creek Inn
Description: Simple roadside hotel offering rooms with microwaves, fridges & TVs, plus free breakfast & parking.

Name: Hyatt House Philadelphia/King of Prussia
Description: Unfussy quarters, some with kitchens, in a relaxed hotel offering a pool, a bar & free breakfast.
